participant_2.background:
I collect memories of my vacations, including the deer I saw on Lake Michigan.
I enjoy lifting weights on my days off to stay in shape.
i start an internship in engineering later this year.
i like to make fresh pies.

content.text: I love going to museums. I really enjoy learning about history and seeing all the beautiful artwork.

Me too! I love how museums can take me to a different time and place. I went to a museum in Chicago that had a whole exhibit on the history of Lake Michigan. It was really cool to see all the old photos and artifacts.
That sounds like a really interesting exhibit. I love learning about the history of the Great Lakes.
Me too! I think it's so fascinating how these massive bodies of water have shaped the landscape and the lives of the people who live around them.
Definitely! I think it's really important to learn about the history of our natural resources.
I agree! It's something that we should all be more aware of.
Yeah, I think it's really important to appreciate the beauty and importance of the natural world.
I totally agree!
What are some of your other hobbies?
I love to bake. I make fresh pies all the time.
That's awesome! I love baking too. I make cookies all the time.
Cookies are delicious! I love making apple pies.
Apple pies are my favorite! I love the smell of them baking in the oven.
Me too! They smell so good.
What kind of engineering are you going to be interning in?
I'm not sure yet. I'm still looking at different companies.
Oh, cool. I hope you find a good one!
Thanks! I'm sure I will.
What kind of car do you drive?
I drive a Toyota Camry.
Nice! I drive a Toyota Corolla.
Toyotas are great cars.
I agree
